name: ghost_fetch
description: Fetch content from any URL using a stealthy headless browser. Bypasses anti-bot protections and returns clean markdown with metadata. Supports session persistence via context_id.

url.description: The URL of the page to fetch (e.g. an X.com post or a protected news article).

context_id.description: Optional persistent session ID. Use this to maintain cookies and a consistent browser fingerprint across multiple requests to the same site (e.g. for multi-step search/navigation).

callback_url.description: Optional URL to receive a POST webhook when the job is completed.

github_issue.description: Optional GitHub issue number to post the results as a comment.
